DOC.brief_summary: This study assess blood pressure reduction nebivolol placebo patient take lisinopril losartan .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Nebivolol ( Added Lisinopril Losartan ) Hypertensive Patients
DOC.criteria: Male female , ambulatory outpatient 1885 year old screening Have history hypertension Qualifying laboratory result Severe hypertension , include chronic kidney disease Documented congestive heart failure Have clinically significant respiratory , liver , heart disease History stroke , heart attack , heart surgery last 6 month Have history hypersensitivity nebivolol beta blocker .
